Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Establishes corporate, business franchise, personal, insurance and banking tax credits for the provision of employee federal qualified transportation fringe benefits
Summary: Establishes corporate, business franchise, personal, insurance and banking tax credits for the provision of employee federal qualified transportation fringe benefits.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to establishing tax credits for taxpayers which provide their employees with access to federal qualified transportation fringe benefits
